title: (x) Deadly Snakes CD-cover - Motter Umbra {Chester}
content:
hello- I'm trying to figure out the typeface used on this album cover (in pink)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214094738im_/http:/typophile.com/files/f86695ligot.jpg)

-looks almost chemical brothers-ish but its not.  
maybe another band has used recently.

many thanks
author: WickerMeetsMan

comments.content: That is older than the Chemical Brothers. Mark will know this one.
I have to be paying attention. I'm not always. :-)

Mark, Tiff is saying you're old.

hhp
NO! That is NOT what I meant. \*shuffles off embarrassed\*

Don't worry, as I'm sure Mark suspects,  
I was just being my troublemaker self! ;-)

hhp
